name: backend
description: A Node-Express backend that accepts a POST with an Iflow ID, looks it up in an Excel-based RICEF tracker (local or SharePoint), enriches data via optional CPI calls or Gemini AI, and feeds the result into a Word-template engine to produce a ready UTD document for downloadâ€”all via clean, modular services and REST APIs.
author: Syed Faizan Ali
